message:
Hello, everyone! Welcome to the AI Future podcast. I'm your host, Lexa. Today, we're going to be talking about the future of AI. We'll be exploring some of the most cutting-edge research happening in the field, and we'll be discussing the potential implications of AI for our society.  

I'm really excited to be talking about this topic with you today. I believe that AI is one of the most important technologies of our time, and I think it has the potential to change our world in profound ways.  

So, without further ado, let's get started!

**Kamel:** **I've been particularly interested in the potential of AI to address some of the world's most pressing challenges. Advancements in AI such as natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision have opened up exciting possibilities for revolutionizing healthcare, education, and environmental sustainability.**
